record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1929. Fourth row: A. A. Stagg, Jr., Lester Cotton, L. R. Brainard, John B. Holt, T. E. Cowley, S. Teibelman, and N. A. Merriam (coach); third row: A. C. East, H. W. Boesel, C. A. Weaver, L. H. Cohen, A. J. Klassen, Maurice Hatheway, B. S. Wattenberg, and E. B. Berndtson; second row: D. A. Letts, V. Livingston, R. B. Williams (captain), S. S. Frey, and V. J. Gist; first row: V. K. Libby, J. M. Jackson, W. Brand, N. R. Root, C. E. Schulz, and H. E. Haydon.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
